TASK-172A.title: Frontend-Backend Integration
TASK-172A.description: Connect authentication UI to JWT backend, integrate marketplace UI with API endpoints, implement real-time updates via WebSocket, ensure responsive design

TASK-172B.title: Production Deployment Pipeline
TASK-172B.description: Docker containerization for all services, CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions, environment configuration, database migration automation, health check endpoints

TASK-172C.title: End-to-End Testing & Validation
TASK-172C.description: Complete user journey tests, cross-browser compatibility, mobile responsiveness testing, performance benchmarking, security penetration testing

TASK-172D.title: Onboarding & Documentation
TASK-172D.description: Interactive onboarding flow, user documentation/help system, API documentation portal, video tutorials for key features

TASK-172E.title: Performance Optimization
TASK-172E.description: Database query optimization, caching strategy implementation, CDN setup for static assets, API response time optimization

TASK-172F.title: Analytics & Monitoring
TASK-172F.description: User analytics integration, error tracking (Sentry), performance monitoring, admin dashboard for metrics
